TopicTitle: I have joined the Forum! W00T!

Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP since it was on sale this holidays, along with some random time with friends PC's, but I've decided to join up here! Hopefully I can contribute to the progression of this amazing game! One question, though! When can I upload an avatar? I feel so... empty without one...
You'll need a few approved posts before you can edit your profile, including the avatar. One down.

Welcome to the forums, good luck!

You won't need it though, the communty here is excellent.

How far have you gotten in KSP? The mÃƒÂ¼n yet?

There are diffrent parts of the forum where you can post diffrent things.

Welcome aboard, glad to have you!

Take a look at the Tutorials sub-forum, I'm sure it will be of great use to a new player! (and there are also tutorials on more advanced concepts for when you're more experienced)

Regards,

Northstar

W00t indeed! We're glad to have you! And never fear, I believe you'll have your avatar soon enough. It doesn't take long to get the required amount of posts!

Welcome aboard! *salutes*

I've gotten to the mun and back, using some lovely Saturn replica's from the FASA mod! Career mode will be the next endeavour...

This is one of the best game forums I've seen, I'm happy to be a part of it!
Welcome to the forums! As said before, you need 5 posts to have an avatar/change your profile.

This is one of the best game forums I've seen, I'm happy to be a part of it!

This is no where near one of the best.

IT IS THE BEST!
Oh god. I feel sorry for you. Now you will never get a normal nights sleep and welcome to the sometimes MÃƒÂ¼nebin.
